knimeNode.name: X-Aggregator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node that aggregates the result for cross validation.

fullDescription.intro: This node must be the end of a cross validation loop and must follow a X-Partitioner node. It collects the result from a predictor node, compares predicted class and real class and outputs the predictions for all rows and the iteration statistics.
fullDescription.option: Column containing the true class label

ports.dataIn: Contains the class column and the prediction column to compare
ports.dataOut: Collected output tables from the predictor
